page.title: 12Sport and Outdoor Activities
page.content: 1 There are few sports facilities in our area.East Langton,which has a cricket pitch where visiting teams play,has an adult cricket team,an Under 12s and an Under 16s.Behind our school are playing fields used for football and athletics.People go into Leicester to see football,basketball, cricket,gridiron football and rugby. You can play golf at Market Harborough or Kibworth.There is a swimming pool at Market Harborough.There are 3 private swimming pools and 2 private tennis courts in our area.There are no places for water sports. Many children ride BMX bikes and some go fishing at Thorpe Langton brook.At playtime we play games such as cricket,football and British bulldogs.At our school there are football and netball teams.Every year we have a school Sports Day.
